TEXT.TITLE: TANDEM COMPUTERS <TNDM> PICKED BY FOOD CHAIN
TEXT.BODY: Tandem Computers Inc said <Carr-Gottstein Co Inc>, a grocery and commercial real estate concern, installed a Tandem NonStop EXT10 computer system to provide check authorization for its statewide chain of supermarkets. Reuter
